item.description:
OK, and the winner is ------- drum roll please------- TRISH. Trish was first with a suggestion for a meetup location and I really like the venue she chose for us, and the special price she and Salute's are offering our group. Please check out the website and join us at 7PM on Friday. http://saluteitaliang... . Thanks to Salute's and to Trish for offering our group complimentary Pizzas and 1/2 price appetizers, our drink specials will be $3 specialty Martini's, well drinks, draft beer and wine. This is likely the best offer we've ever seen and I would encourage everyone to sign up early. As always, my phone number for questions, complaints, suggestions or directions is:
802
233
9060

See ya at Salute's

Tom

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Salute'
